articles.author: MPX
articles.title: MTP Daily 1/6/20
articles.description: MTP Daily is a public affairs program hosted by Chuck Todd that follows the Trump administration and features the top news-makers of the day as they analyze and break down the issues.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Col. Wilkerson speaks out against the march to war
articles.description: Colonel Lawrence Wilkerson, chief of staff to Secretary of State Colin Powell during the 2003 march to war in Iraq, speaks out about the current rationale for military action, saying "It's bull."

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Chris Hayes on our pro-war crimes president
articles.description: Donald Trump's position on war crimes is an "absolute moral abomination," says Chris Hayes.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Sen. Tim Kaine on contradiction of taking Senate oath and...
articles.description: Sen. Kaine: “How do you explain, ‘I took an oath to do impartial justice, but I didn’t want to hear from John Bolton’?”

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: ‘Drug deal’ witness puts impeachment trial heat on GOP: Trump ‘cover up’ if blocked
articles.description: As John Bolton defies Trump and agrees to testify in the impeachment trial, he is placing new heat on ‘moderate’ republicans. MSNBC Chief Legal Correspondent Ari Melber argues as “the ultimate witness” Bolton has cancelled any claims that “national security p…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Chris Hayes: This is a worst-case scenario
articles.description: Hayes: “We are on the precipice of what many imagined as a worse-case scenario of Donald Trump as President of the United States.”

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Chris Matthews warns the assassination of Soleimani can drive...
articles.description: On the decision to assassinate General Soleimani, Chris says, “Assassination is not a means to avoid war. It is a trigger to war, a step toward regime change on which the neo-cons like John Bolton have set their hearts. For them, the lesson of Vietnam is how …

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Impeachment 'drug deal' witness Bolton agrees to testify at Trump trial, defying WH
articles.description: John Bolton, Trump’s former National Security Adviser, is now “prepared to testify” at Trump’s impeachment trial, after many efforts to stonewall. MSNBC Chief Legal Correspondent Ari Melber reports on how Bolton’s testimony has “single-handedly reignited the …

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Fmr. Undersecretary of Defense on Trump and Iran: He’s poured...
articles.description: Fmr. Undersecretary of Defense Michèle Flournoy says that Trump “poured fuel on the fire” with his recent moves on Iran.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Amy Klobuchar says Trump’s problems with Iran ‘predictable’ since nuclear deal pullout
articles.description: On the decision to assassinate General Soleimani, Senator Amy Klobuchar said she only calls Iran an international threat because “I was afraid of the escalation of Donald Trump. Trace this back when he got us out of that international agreement."

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Mitt Romney wants to hear from John Bolton in impeachment trial
articles.description: Utah Senator Mitt Romney told reporters that he would like to hear from John Bolton but left it up to the leaders of both parties to negotiate when and if that will happen.
